attributes.action: Make petition signatures visible, offer anonymity
attributes.additional_details:
Please allow signatures on the e-petitions website to be visible when an e-petition is viewed. When signing an e-petition the option of anonymity from this visible list should, in fairness, be offered.

Viewing your own and other signatures on an e-petition will raise public confidence in the reliability of this electronic version of the petition. Signatures will be rewarded with the security of knowing that 'My vote has been counted'. The e-petitioning service will gain some welcoming transparency.
